original_text: Because of that, son of man, pretend that you are going away as a prisoner. During the day, prepare your things for the journey. While people are watching, prepare to leave your home and go to another place. The people refuse to obey me, but perhaps they will understand what you are doing.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 포로의 행장을 꾸리고 낮에 그들의 목전에서 끌려가라 네가 네 처소를 다른 곳으로 옮기는 것을 그들이 보면 비록 반역하는 족속이라도 혹 생각이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Because of that, son of man
pretend that you are going away as a prisoner
During the day, prepare your things for the journey
sentences.korean_translation: 낮 동안 여행을 위해 네 물건을 준비하라

sentences.original_text: prepare to leave your home and go to another place
sentences.korean_translation: 네 집을 떠나 다른 곳으로 가는 것을 준비하라

sentences.original_text: The people refuse to obey me
but perhaps they will understand what you are doing
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그들이 네가 하는 일을 깨달을지도 모르겠다
